rpg.creature

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.creature.Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hero, Monster

    public abstract class Creature
extends Object
    A class of creatures involving a name, hitpoints, strength, protection, capacity and a list of anchorpoints.
    Author:
    Mathias, Frederic

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Creature(String name, int maximumHitpoints)
      Initializes a new creature with the given name and maximum hitpoints and sets the hitpoints of this creature to the maximum hitpoints.

public Creature(String name,

      • getAnchors

        @Basic
@Raw
public ArrayList<Anchor> getAnchors()
        Returns all the anchors which belong to this creature.
        Returns:
        The length of the resulting arraylist is equal to the number of anchors that belong to this creature. | result.size() == getNbAnchors()

public static void setStrengthPrecision(int precision)

        Parameters:
        precision - The precision of the strength

      • getStrengthPrecision

        @Basic
@Raw
public static int getStrengthPrecision()
        Returns the strength precision for each creature.

      • getStrength

        public double getStrength()
        Returns the strength of this creature where the precision is equal to the strength precision.
        Returns:
        The strength of this creature rounded down so the precision is equal to the strength precision. | result == (Math.round(strength*Math.pow(10, getStrengthPrecision())) /Math.pow(10, getStrengthPrecision()))

        public abstract Weight getCapacity()

      • getTotalWeight

        public Weight getTotalWeight()
        Returns the total weight of all the items in the anchors of this creature.
        Returns:
        The sum of all the total weights of the elements in the anchorpoints. | let | retWeight = new Weight(0, WeightUnit.KG) | in | for each anchor in getAnchors(): | if(anchor.getItem() != null) then | if( anchor.getItem() instanceof Container ) then | retWeight = retWeight.add( | ((Container)anchor.getItem()).getTotalWeight() ) | else | retWeight = retWeight.add( anchor.getItem().getWeight() ) | result == retWeight

      • getTotalValue

        public int getTotalValue()
        Returns the total value of all the items this creature carries in its anchors.
        Returns:
        The sum of all the total values of the items in the anchors of this creature. | let | totalValue = 0 | in | for each anchor in getAnchors(): | if( anchor.getItem() != null) then | if (anchor.getItem() instanceof BackPack) | totalValue += ((BackPack)anchor.getItem()).getTotalValue() | else | totalValue += += item.getValue() | result == totalValue

      • getProtection

        public abstract int getProtection()
        Returns the protection factor of this creature.
        Returns:
        The result is positive. | result >= 0

      • getName

public String getName()

      • canHaveAsName

        @Raw
public boolean canHaveAsName(String name)
        Checks whether this creature can have the given name as its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given name is effective. | result == ( name != null )

      • hasValidName

        @Raw
public boolean hasValidName()
        Checks whether this creature has a valid name.
        Returns:
        True if the creature can have its name as its name. | result == ( canHaveAsName( getName() ) )

      • getHitpoints

        @Basic
@Raw
public int getHitpoints()
        Return the number of hitpoints of this creature.

      • canHaveAsHitpoints

        @Raw
public boolean canHaveAsHitpoints(int hitpoints)
        Checks whether this creature can have the given number of hitpoints as its hitpoints.
        Parameters:
        hitpoints - The hitpoints to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given hitpoints greater than or equal to 0 and if the hitpoints are less than or equal to the maximum number of hitpoints this creature can have and the number of hitpoints is a prime number. | result == ( (hitpoints >= 0) && ( hitpoints <= getMaximumHitpoints() ) && ( isPrime(hitpoints) ) )

      • hasValidHitpoints

        @Raw
public boolean hasValidHitpoints()
        Checks whether this creature has a valid number of hitpoints.
        Returns:
        True if and only if this creature can have its hitpoints as its hitpoints. | result == ( canHaveAsHitpoints( getHitpoints() ) )

      • weaken

        public boolean weaken(int damage)
        Weaken this creature with the given amount of hitpoints
        Parameters:
        damage - The amount of hitpoints to subtract
        Returns:
        True if and only if the hitpoints of this creature are negative | result == ( (getHitpoints() - damage) <= 0 )

@Raw
public int getMaximumHitpoints()

      • isValidMaximumHitpoints

        @Raw
public static boolean isValidMaximumHitpoints(int maxHitpoints)
        Check whether the given maximum number of hitpoints is a valid number of maximum hitpoints.
        Parameters:
        maxHitpoints - The maximum number of hitpoints to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if maxHitpoints is strictly positive and maxHitpoints is a prime. | result == ( maxHitpoints > 0 && isPrime(maxHitpoints) )

      • hasValidMaximumHitpoints

        @Raw
public boolean hasValidMaximumHitpoints()
        Checks whether this creatures maximum number of hitpoints
        Returns:
        True if and only if the maximum number of hitpoints of this creature is valid. | result == ( isValidMaximumHitpoints( getMaximumHitpoints() ) )

      • getAnchor

        public Anchor getAnchor(String name)
        Returns the first occurence of an anchor with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the anchor to retrieve.

      • canAddItem

        @Raw
public boolean canAddItem(@Raw
                     Item item)
        Checks whether the given item can be added to this creature.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to check
        Returns:
        True if and only if the sum of the total weight of this creature and the weight of the given item is less than or equal to the capacity of this creature. | result == ( getTotalWeight().add(item.getWeight()).compareTo(getCapacity()) <= 0 )

      • canHaveAsAnchor

        @Raw
public boolean canHaveAsAnchor(@Raw
                          Anchor anchor)
        Checks whether this creature can have the given anchor as an anchor.
        Parameters:
        anchor - The anchor to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the anchor is effective and the holder if the anchor is equal to this creature. | result == ( ( anchor != null) && ( anchor.getHolder() == this) )

      • hasProperAnchors

        @Raw
public boolean hasProperAnchors()
        Checks whether the anchors this creature has are valid anchors.
        Returns:
        True if and only if each anchor can have the anchor as an anchor. | result == for each anchor in anchors: canHaveAsAnchor(anchor)

      • hasAsAnchor

        public boolean hasAsAnchor(Anchor anchor)
        Check whether this creature has the given anchor as one of its anchors.
        Parameters:
        anchor - The anchor to check
        Returns:
        True if and only if this creature has the given anchor as one of its anchors at some index. | result == for some I in 0..getNbAnchors(): | ( getAnchorAt(I) == anchor )
